channel.title: [PI] ~Rune-X-Scape V4 Release & WebDesign~
channel.description:
[center][b]
[img]http://i.picasion.com/pic39/82723cb790ade14678a81b7a7777190c.gif[/img]
Any problems please dont remove the thread. Just lock the thread & i will edit as soon as possible thanks. :) ;) :D :mad: :( :eek: :cool: :rolleyes: :P :o :confused: :| ;D :palm:
[youtube]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=kUroLcUES18&feature=c4-overview&list=UU_Cij1XyY85PBkxm8zUe_dA[/youtube]
Currently Searching for a Team. Contact me skype:haviland41
Information: Base: Project Insanity
Credits: Sanity Sagi Chri55w haviland4 (me)
[img]http://i1361.photobucket.com/albums/r679/haviland66/rxs2222_zps852ba84d.png[/img]
Please message me if links go down and ill re upload
Download v1 Rune-x-scape Base Server: http://uppit.com/wl35q98pos3s/Rune-X-Scape_-_V1_Server.rar Client: http://uppit.com/5goosuee1opy/Rune-X-Scape_V1_Weblient.rar
Please message me if links go down and ill re upload
V4 Rune-x-scape cache: https://www.dropbox.com/s/in1p8gi85n4i9no/V4.zip V4 Rune-x-scape cache: http://up.ht/18KSiNm
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
#YOU WILL NEED TO#
1,Go into CacheDownloader.java (Client sided) 2,Change Download Link to the new v4 rune-x-scape cache. 3,might want to re upload the v4.0 cache to your dropbox account before adding.
4,Go into Client.java (Client sided) 5.Press ctrl & f = Search haviland66.no-ip.org 6,Change to your ip address/no-ip/localhost
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Rune-X-Scape V5 :|
Comment your suggestion!
#WebClient ready #Aglity glitched fixed #updated WebDesign #Auto Vote System
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- Fixes New v4.0 Cache rune-x-scape Mute system - easy fix but many PI's dont have :S Zamorak Godwars bosses - animations work so they no longer flicker Made client window non resizable fixed remove X dupe method fixed some memory leak issues (not 100% but is much better) - See printscreen fixed some of items equiping to wrong slot and showing incorrectly (pvp armours) fixed the logout glitch at duel arena where it would spam the server when you logged out
Additions Kalphite queen with working animations working points system (slayer/pking/boss killing to earn points) working tokul shops kill/death ratio with counters in the quest tab quick chat fully working where it doesnt say "0 hans" when you have no task Edgeville home with all alters and shop added working zamorak brews + magic potions and custom "combat potion" re-coded commands file, added lots of new commands and neatnd the file up however still needs some tidying fully working exp lamps use "agility top" on agility npc's for exp bonuses (can be bought with agility tickets) added 3 agility courses (gnome, barbarian and wilderness) added lots of teleports
[img]http://i1361.photobucket.com/albums/r679/haviland66/Untitled_zps39852789.png[/img]
[img]http://i1361.photobucket.com/albums/r679/haviland66/rxs_zpsae5ed8ce.png[/img]
https://www.dropbox.com/s/3i8oxppp8s7h2hm/RXS%20SITE.rar
[img]http://img560.imageshack.us/img560/6615/shopsq.png[/img]
[img]http://img600.imageshack.us/img600/8592/memleak.png[/img]
guides to change the IP go to client.java and search for Code: [Select] server =change the Code: [Select] 127.0.0.1to your IP or no-ip address, save and compile and your done
to enable x10 hit multiplier go to client.java and search for: Code: [Select] public static boolean newDamage = false;change the "false" to "true", save and compile
[/b][/center]

item.title: [PI] ~Rune-X-Scape V4 Release & WebDesign~
item.dc:creator: @haviland4 haviland4
item.description:
@haviland4 wrote:

[center][b]

Any problems please dont remove the thread. Just lock the thread & i will edit as soon as possible thanks.
:mad: :eek: :rolleyes: :o ;D :palm:

[youtube]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=kUroLcUES18&feature=c4-overview&list=UU_Cij1XyY85PBkxm8zUe_dA[/youtube]

Currently Searching for a Team.
Contact me skype:haviland41

Information:
Base: Project Insanity

Credits:
Sanity
Sagi
Chri55w
haviland4 (me)

rxs2222_zps852ba84d.png762×525

Please message me if links go down and ill re upload

Download v1 Rune-x-scape Base
Server: http://uppit.com/wl35q98pos3s/Rune-X-Scape_-_V1_Server.rar
Client: http://uppit.com/5goosuee1opy/Rune-X-Scape_V1_Weblient.rar

Please message me if links go down and ill re upload

V4 Rune-x-scape cache: https://www.dropbox.com/s/in1p8gi85n4i9no/V4.zip
V4 Rune-x-scape cache: http://up.ht/18KSiNm

#YOU WILL NEED TO#

1,Go into CacheDownloader.java (Client sided)
2,Change Download Link to the new v4 rune-x-scape cache.
3,might want to re upload the v4.0 cache to your dropbox account before adding.

4,Go into Client.java (Client sided)
5.Press ctrl & f = Search haviland66.no-ip.org
6,Change to your ip address/no-ip/localhost

Rune-X-Scape V5

Comment your suggestion!

#WebClient ready
#Aglity glitched fixed
#updated WebDesign
#Auto Vote System

Fixes
New v4.0 Cache rune-x-scape
Mute system - easy fix but many PI’s dont have :S
Zamorak Godwars bosses - animations work so they no longer flicker
Made client window non resizable
fixed remove X dupe method
fixed some memory leak issues (not 100% but is much better) - See printscreen
fixed some of items equiping to wrong slot and showing incorrectly (pvp armours)
fixed the logout glitch at duel arena where it would spam the server when you logged out

Additions
Kalphite queen with working animations
working points system (slayer/pking/boss killing to earn points)
working tokul shops
kill/death ratio with counters in the quest tab
quick chat fully working where it doesnt say “0 hans” when you have no task
Edgeville home with all alters and shop
added working zamorak brews + magic potions and custom “combat potion”
re-coded commands file, added lots of new commands and neatnd the file up however still needs some tidying
fully working exp lamps
use “agility top” on agility npc’s for exp bonuses (can be bought with agility tickets)
added 3 agility courses (gnome, barbarian and wilderness)
added lots of teleports

Untitled_zps39852789.png768×515

rxs_zpsae5ed8ce.png1024×576

Dropbox

Dropbox - Error

Dropbox is a free service that lets you bring your photos, docs, and videos anywhere and share them easily. Never email yourself a file again!

guides
to change the IP
go to client.java and search for
Code: [Select]
server =change the
Code: [Select]
127.0.0.1to your IP or no-ip address, save and compile and your done

to enable x10 hit multiplier
go to client.java and search for:
Code: [Select]
public static boolean newDamage = false;change the “false” to “true”, save and compile

[/b][/center]

Read full topic
